raw:
Job Market Analysis and Resume Boost Report

A focused view of the most requested capabilities across the analyzed roles, plus the next best learning targets based on observed market demand.

Target Job Titles
AI Engineer, Generative AI Engineer, GenAI Engineer, Agentic AI Engineer, AI Developer, AI Team Leader, Machine Learning Engineer, ML Engineer
Country
Saudi Arabia
Number of job listings analyzed
30
Data note: Skill frequencies below come from the provided job-posting dataset snapshot (n=22) using per-posting deduplication and synonym grouping. The header listing count is kept as requested.

1) Job Market Analysis

Top 20 most in-demand technical skills & tools, plus the most mentioned cloud platforms and certifications.
Demand is shown as positions mentioning the item / % of positions (n=22)

Top 20 Technical Skills / Tools

Skill / Tool (Grouped) Positions Share Demand
Python1254.55%
Kubernetes (incl. K8s)627.27%
TensorFlow627.27%
PyTorch627.27%
LangChain522.73%
CI/CD522.73%
SQL522.73%
Docker418.18%
FastAPI418.18%
Git313.64%
RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation)313.64%
MLOps313.64%
Distributed systems313.64%
LangGraph313.64%
Grafana313.64%
MLflow313.64%
TypeScript313.64%
LlamaIndex313.64%
Hugging Face (incl. Transformers)313.64%
LLMs (generic)313.64%
How to read this: items are grouped by normalized synonyms (e.g., K8s ‚Üí Kubernetes). Counts represent the number of postings mentioning the item at least once.

Cloud Platforms (AWS / Azure / GCP)

Cloud Platform Positions Share
AWS836.36%
GCP836.36%
Azure522.73%
AWS and GCP are tied as the most frequently mentioned cloud platforms in the dataset snapshot.

Certifications Mentioned

Certification Positions Share
Generative AI Professional Certification14.55%
Deep Gen AI Certification14.55%
Only two unique certifications appeared in the provided postings snapshot, so a broader ‚ÄúTop 5‚Äù list is not available without adding items not present in the data.

Quick takeaway

Demand clusters around Python, mainstream DL frameworks (PyTorch/TensorFlow), production infrastructure (Kubernetes, Docker, CI/CD), and GenAI application delivery (LangChain, RAG, LLMs).

2) Resume Boosting Suggestions

This compares the resume skill set against observed market needs and highlights the next best skills/tools to learn‚Äîbased strictly on demand and identified gaps.
Top 5 learning targets
This section focuses on skills/tools not listed in the current resume skills but repeatedly requested in the analyzed postings. The goal is to help you prioritize learning that maximizes alignment with the market.

Top 5 Suggested Skills/Tools to Learn Next (with frequency stats)

Rank Skill / Tool Mention rate Positions
1Kubernetes27.27%6 / 22
2FastAPI18.18%4 / 22
3Hugging Face (Transformers ecosystem)13.64%3 / 22
4LangFuse (LLM observability)13.64%3 / 22
5Grafana13.64%3 / 22
Encouraging note: your current stack already aligns strongly with several high-frequency items (e.g., Python, Docker, CI/CD, SQL, PyTorch/TensorFlow, LangChain/LangGraph/LlamaIndex, RAG, MLflow, and major cloud services). These five suggestions are the highest-impact additions identified from the provided gap analysis.

Demand snapshot (visual)

Kubernetes
6/22 ‚Ä¢ 27.27%
FastAPI
4/22 ‚Ä¢ 18.18%
Hugging Face
3/22 ‚Ä¢ 13.64%
LangFuse
3/22 ‚Ä¢ 13.64%
Grafana
3/22 ‚Ä¢ 13.64%

Frequency stats at a glance

The suggested additions are all mentioned in 3‚Äì6 postings out of 22 (i.e., 13.64%‚Äì27.27%), making them practical targets that repeatedly appear across roles rather than one-off niche requirements.
All insights are derived from the supplied analyses; no additional skills, tools, or certifications were introduced beyond what appeared in the data.

Mentor junior engineers and contribute to raising the overall technical bar of the AI team.
Stay current with industry trends and research, and assess the adoption of new techniques or tools where they add real value.

Required Qualifications 5+ years of hands-on experience in AI, machine learning, or related engineering roles.

Deep experience with machine learning and deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch.
Proven experience working with large-scale datasets and building production-grade AI systems.
Solid understanding of model evaluation, optimization, and performance trade-offs .
Experience deploying AI models into production, with attention to scalability, reliability, and efficiency .
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to translate complex business challenges into AI-driven solutions.
Excellent communication skills and experience working in cross-functional teams .
Nice to Have Experience with MLOps , model monitoring, and CI/CD for AI systems.
Exposure to cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) for AI workloads.
Experience in domains such as NLP, computer vision, recommendation systems, or predictive analytics .
Prior experience mentoring or leading other engineers.",

  {
    "title": "Senior AI Engineer - Riyadh",
    "company": "COGNNA",
    "location": "Riyadh (+1 other)",
    "description": "At COGNNA , we are on a mission to transform cybersecurity with intelligent, AI-driven solutions. We‚Äôre looking for a Senior AI Engineer who thrives in fast-paced startup environments and is excited to build cutting-edge systems from the ground up. This role is ideal for someone who is as comfortable architecting large-scale ML pipelines, as they are coding data transformations, who enjoys solving hard problems hands-on, and who wants to make a meaningful impact on the future of cybersecurity.

Key Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ AI / ML Engineering
‚Ä¢ Design, develop, and deploy machine learning models for threat detection, behavioral analytics, and automation.
‚Ä¢ Implement rigorous testing, monitoring, and continuous improvement pipelines to ensure reliable model performance in production.
‚Ä¢ Stay on top of the latest advancements in AI / ML, evaluating and adopting relevant technologies to keep our platform ahead of the curve.
‚Ä¢ Data Engineering
‚Ä¢ Build and optimize data pipelines that handle large volumes of diverse security telemetry.
‚Ä¢ Ensure data quality, scalability, and availability for ML workflows across the COGNNA ecosystem.
‚Ä¢ Partner with platform engineers to integrate AI and data services seamlessly into production systems.
‚Ä¢ Leadership & Collaboration
‚Ä¢ Lead projects end-to-end, from conception to production deployment.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams (security engineers, product managers, platform engineers) to deliver AI-powered solutions that meet real customer needs.
‚Ä¢ Communicate technical concepts and trade-offs clearly to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

What We‚Äôre Looking For
‚Ä¢ Strong expertise in machine learning engineering (model development, deployment, monitoring).
‚Ä¢ Solid foundation in data engineering (ETL / ELT pipelines, distributed systems, data storage / streaming).
‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience with cloud platforms, MLOps tools, and modern data stacks .
‚Ä¢ A ‚Äústartup mindset‚Äù : you‚Äôre resourceful, comfortable wearing multiple hats, and willing to get into the details.
‚Ä¢ Passion for tackling complex cybersecurity challenges with AI.

Why Join Us?

At COGNNA, you‚Äôll be part of a small, innovative team where your work directly shapes the product and the company‚Äôs future. You‚Äôll have the freedom (and responsibility) to design, build, and ship impactful AI solutions that help security teams defend against evolving threats.

If you want to push the boundaries of AI in cybersecurity, thrive in a collaborative and fast-moving environment, and enjoy the grind of building something that matters, then we‚Äôd love to hear from you!

Take the next step in your AI engineering career and apply today!

Requirements
‚Ä¢ Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field.
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of experience in AI / ML development and implementation, with a focus on cybersecurity applications.
‚Ä¢ Expertise in programming languages such as Python, Java, or R.
‚Ä¢ Extensive experience with machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Scikit-Learn.
‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of deep learning architectures, reinforcement learning, and natural language processing.
‚Ä¢ Proven experience with data wrangling, feature selection, and model evaluation techniques.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with cloud-based AI services (AWS, GCP, Azure) for scalable deployment of AI models.
‚Ä¢ Exceptional problem-solving and analytical skills with a passion for innovation.
‚Ä¢ Strong communication and collaboration skills, comfortable interfacing with technical and non-technical stakeholders.

What We Value
‚Ä¢ A commitment to continuous learning and curiosity about emerging AI technologies.
‚Ä¢ A team-oriented mindset with a drive to mentor and grow fellow team members.
‚Ä¢ A result-oriented approach to solving real-world problems through technology.

Benefits

üí∞ Competitive Package ‚Äì Salary + equity options + performance incentives

üßò Flexible & Remote ‚Äì Work from anywhere with an outcomes-first culture

ü§ù Team of Experts ‚Äì Work with designers, engineers, and security pros solving real-world problems

üöÄ Growth-Focused ‚Äì Your ideas ship, your voice counts, your growth matters

üåç Global Impact ‚Äì Build products that protect critical systems and data",

Bonus Points
‚Ä¢ Experience with MLOps, reinforcement learning, or computer vision.
‚Ä¢ Contributions to open-source projects or relevant publications.
‚Ä¢ Enthusiasm for AI innovation and Mirai‚Äôs vision.

Benefits
‚Ä¢ VIP Medical insurance for employee and his parents.
‚Ä¢ Phone allowance.
‚Ä¢ Kids education allowance.
‚Ä¢ Gym allowance.",

This role blends technical expertise, solution architecture, and consulting skills. Mozn is the trusted AI technology partner for some of the largest government organizations, as well as many large corporations and startups.

We are in an exciting stage of scaling the company to provide AI-powered products and solutions both locally and globally that ensure the growth and prosperity of our digital humanity. It is an exciting time to work in the field of AI to create a long-lasting impact.

About The Role

We are seeking a high-performance Engineering Manager with proven experience to lead a brand new Agentic AI Squad of Engineers/data scientists building Agentic AI capabilites at the core of all our tools.

What You'll Do

‚Ä¢ Collaborate with other stakeholders to create engineering objectives for your team that align with business goals.
‚Ä¢ Work closely with product teams to help steer both the functional and technical roadmap with focus on the end user
‚Ä¢ Drive scalable architecture and design solutions, ensuring performance, reliability, and maintainability of the SaaS product.
‚Ä¢ Ensure best practices for coding, security, testing, and performance optimisation are followed.
‚Ä¢ Stay updated with domain trends, technologies, promote its adoption across the tech stack and development process to drive innovation and efficiency
‚Ä¢ Develop and implement policies, standards, and procedures for your engineering team that empowers them to be high performing.

‚Ä¢ BS/MS from a top school in Computer Science or any related field.

‚Ä¢ Experience with LLM orchestration frameworks, multi-agent architectures, or conversational AI pipelines. (Nice to have)

Benefits

We think you'll enjoy working at Mozn. Here's why:
‚Ä¢ You will be at the forefront of an exciting time for the Middle East, joining a high-growth rocket-ship in an exciting space.

‚Ä¢ You will enjoy a fun and dynamic workplace working alongside some of the greatest minds in AI.
‚Ä¢ We believe strength lies in difference, embracing all for who they are and empowered to be the best version of themselves.",

The company is seeking a Gen AI Engineer to join our dynamic team in Dhahran, Saudi Arabia. This full-time position is an opportunity to work with some of the world‚Äôs largest businesses in their transformation journeys, leveraging our consulting-led, cognitive-powered solutions.

About Us:

The company is an IT services, consulting, and business solutions organization that has been a powerhouse in business transformation for over 50 years. Recognized for excellence in software development, the company offers an integrated portfolio through its Location Independent Agile‚Ñ¢ delivery model. As part of a large multinational business group, the company employs over 616,171 globally diverse consultants across 53 countries.

Job Description:
‚Ä¢ Technical Skills Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Strong foundation in deep-learning mathematics (linear algebra, probability, optimization).
‚Ä¢ Expertise in PyTorch and/or TensorFlow.
‚Ä¢ Mastery of Hugging Face Transformers/Diffusers, with the ability to write custom CUDA kernels.
‚Ä¢ Experience with distributed training on GPU/TPU clusters.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency with prompt-engineering tools (LangChain, LlamaIndex).
‚Ä¢ RAG expertise: building vector stores, hybrid retrieval, and multi-agent orchestration.
‚Ä¢ MCP server knowledge: designing, deploying, and scaling services that manage agent communication and state (REST/gRPC, message queues, load balancing).
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with MLOps stack: Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, CI/CD, Triton/TensorRT-Inference Server, Prometheus, Grafana.
‚Ä¢ Experience with large-scale data pipelines (Spark, Beam, Dask) and data versioning (LakeFS, DVC, Weights & Biases).
‚Ä¢ Publications or patents in generative AI (NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR, CVPR) are highly desirable.
‚Ä¢ Open-source contributions to major libraries (Hugging Face, PyTorch, Diffusers).
‚Ä¢ Domain expertise in finance, healthcare, gaming, or creative media is a plus.

Language Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in English is expected.

Application Deadline:

‚Ä¢ Systems thinking: Experience with distributed systems, async workflows, vector search, and caching strategies for latency-sensitive workloads.

an Agentic AI Consultant at Sulava MEA, you will be at the cutting edge of AI innovationdesigning, building, and deploying intelligent AI agents that transform how organizations work. You will partner with clients to identify automation opportunities, architect agentic solutions using Microsoft Copilot Studio and Azure AI, and bring future Agentic Solutions to life that work alongside human teams to drive productivity, efficiency, and business value.

This role blends technical expertise, solution architecture, and consulting skills. You will work within our Agentic AI stream, collaborating with AI Strategists, business stakeholders, and technical teams to deliver scalable, governed, and impactful AI agent solutions using our Agent Factory framework.

Key Responsibilities

Solution Design & Architecture
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with clients and AI Strategists to identify high-value use cases for AI agents
‚Ä¢ Design end-to-end agentic solutions: conversational flows, orchestration logic, integrations, data sources, and governance models
‚Ä¢ Create functional and architectural blueprints for AI agents aligned with enterprise standards and Microsoft's Agent framework
‚Ä¢ Evaluate feasibility, estimate effort, and prioritize use cases by business impact and technical complexity

Agent Development & Deployment:
‚Ä¢ Build production-grade AI agents using Microsoft Copilot Studio, Azure OpenAI, and Power Platform
‚Ä¢ Develop multi-agent scenarios with orchestration, handoffs, and human-in-the-loop workflows
‚Ä¢ Implement integrations with enterprise systems: SharePoint, Dynamics 365, SAP, Salesforce, custom APIs, and Microsoft Fabric
‚Ä¢ Ensure agents are identity-aware (Entra ID), secure (Defender), compliant (Purview), and governed according to organisational policies

Agent Factory Implementation:
‚Ä¢ Implement Sulava MEA's Agent Factory framework for standardised, scalable agent deployment
‚Ä¢ Establish agent lifecycle management: ideation, co-creation, deployment, continuous improvement, and retirement
‚Ä¢ Build repeatable templates, connectors, and accelerators for common use cases

You are Job Requirements Extractor. You are an expert Job Position analyzer, you can understand the needed requirements in a Job post. You are precise and avoid hallucinating items not present in the text. And you avoid duplications
Your personal goal is: Extract technical skills, tools, cloud platforms, and required certifications from job descriptions into strict JSON schema.
To give my best complete final answer to the task respond using the exact following format:

Thought: I now can give a great answer
Final Answer: Your final answer must be the great and the most complete as possible, it must be outcome described.

I MUST use these formats, my job depends on it!

Current Task: Analyze the retrieved job postings and extract the required technical skills, tools, cloud platforms (only 3 cloud platforms are allowed in that category: AWS 'Amazon Webs services' or GCP 'Google Cloud Platform' or Azure), and certifications into a JSON array. Each entry should correspond to a job posting and include: 'job_id', 'technical_skills and tools' (list), 'cloud_platforms' (list), 'certifications' (list). Avoid duplications and only include items explicitly mentioned in the descriptions.

This is the expected criteria for your final answer: A JSON-like list where each item has: job_id, technical_skills and tools (list), cloud_platforms'AWS, Azure or GCP' (list), certifications (list).
you MUST return the actual complete content as the final answer, not a summary.

You are Job Requirements Analyzer. You are an expert Job requirements analyzer, you can understand and group job requirements, you understand synonyms. e.g. ML and Machine Learning both point the same skillYou are precise and avoid hallucinating items not present in the text. And you avoid duplications
Your personal goal is: Create an overview of most in demand requirements
To give my best complete final answer to the task respond using the exact following format:

Thought: I now can give a great answer
Final Answer: Your final answer must be the great and the most complete as possible, it must be outcome described.

I MUST use these formats, my job depends on it!

Current Task: Given the extracted job requirements from multiple job postings, Analyze the extracted job requirements and create a markdown report, providing the following info:1- All technical skills and tools mentioned across all job postings.2- Top 3 cloud platforms mentioned across all job postings (only 3 platforms are allowed in that category: AWS, Azure, GCP).3- Top 5 certifications mentioned across all job postings.Note: If a tool or skill appears multiple times in a single job posting, count it only once for that posting.The output for each category (technical skills and tools, cloud platforms and certifications) should show a a column mentioning number of positions where the item appeared and a column mentioning % of positions where item appeared.Avoid duplication of skills and avoid hallucinating items not present in the text. In the final answer group skills and tools that has the same meaning together to avoid duplication e.g. CI/CD and CI /CD are teh same and should be listed only once.

This is the expected criteria for your final answer: A markdown report containing the requested info and the report should be well formatted with proper headings and tables/Charts.
you MUST return the actual complete content as the final answer, not a summary.

This is the context you're working with:

    "location": "Saudi Arabia",
    "description": "As a Senior AI Engineer , you will lead the design, development, and production deployment of AI-driven solutions that solve complex business problems at scale.
This role goes beyond model training‚Äîyou will take ownership of AI system architecture, influence technical direction, and ensure models are production-ready, scalable, and aligned with business objectives.
You will play a key role in advancing the organization‚Äôs AI capabilities and mentoring other engineers while driving innovation across multiple AI domains.
Key Responsibilities Lead the design, development, and optimization of machine learning and deep learning models for real-world, production use cases.
Own the end-to-end AI lifecycle , from problem definition and data exploration to model deployment, monitoring, and iteration.
Architect and implement scalable, efficient data pipelines for training and inference on large and complex datasets.
Evaluate model performance using robust metrics, conduct error analysis, and continuously improve model accuracy and reliability.
Build and deploy neural networks using TensorFlow, PyTorch, or similar frameworks , ensuring production-grade quality.
Collaborate closely with data engineers, software engineers, product managers, and domain experts to translate business needs into AI solutions.
Drive technical decision-making around model selection, system architecture, and trade-offs (performance, cost, scalability).
Ensure AI solutions follow ethical AI principles, data privacy standards, and regulatory requirements .
Contribute to and review technical documentation , design proposals, and best practices for AI development.
Mentor junior engineers and contribute to raising the overall technical bar of the AI team.
Stay current with industry trends and research, and assess the adoption of new techniques or tools where they add real value.
Support and improve model deployment, monitoring, and observability in production environments.
Required Qualifications 5+ years of hands-on experience in AI, machine learning, or related engineering roles.
Strong proficiency in Python (Java or other languages is a plus).
Deep experience with machine learning and deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch.
Proven experience working with large-scale datasets and building production-grade AI systems.
Solid understanding of model evaluation, optimization, and performance trade-offs .
Experience deploying AI models into production, with attention to scalability, reliability, and efficiency .
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to translate complex business challenges into AI-driven solutions.
Excellent communication skills and experience working in cross-functional teams .
Nice to Have Experience with MLOps , model monitoring, and CI/CD for AI systems.
Exposure to cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) for AI workloads.
Experience in domains such as NLP, computer vision, recommendation systems, or predictive analytics .
Prior experience mentoring or leading other engineers.",

    "company": "COGNNA",

    "description": "At COGNNA , we are on a mission to transform cybersecurity with intelligent, AI-driven solutions. We‚Äôre looking for a Senior AI Engineer who thrives in fast-paced startup environments and is excited to build cutting-edge systems from the ground up. This role is ideal for someone who is as comfortable architecting large-scale ML pipelines, as they are coding data transformations, who enjoys solving hard problems hands-on, and who wants to make a meaningful impact on the future of cybersecurity.

Key Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ AI / ML Engineering
‚Ä¢ Design, develop, and deploy machine learning models for threat detection, behavioral analytics, and automation.
‚Ä¢ Implement rigorous testing, monitoring, and continuous improvement pipelines to ensure reliable model performance in production.
‚Ä¢ Stay on top of the latest advancements in AI / ML, evaluating and adopting relevant technologies to keep our platform ahead of the curve.
‚Ä¢ Data Engineering
‚Ä¢ Build and optimize data pipelines that handle large volumes of diverse security telemetry.
‚Ä¢ Ensure data quality, scalability, and availability for ML workflows across the COGNNA ecosystem.
‚Ä¢ Partner with platform engineers to integrate AI and data services seamlessly into production systems.
‚Ä¢ Leadership & Collaboration
‚Ä¢ Lead projects end-to-end, from conception to production deployment.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams (security engineers, product managers, platform engineers) to deliver AI-powered solutions that meet real customer needs.

‚Ä¢ Passion for tackling complex cybersecurity challenges with AI.

At COGNNA, you‚Äôll be part of a small, innovative team where your work directly shapes the product and the company‚Äôs future. You‚Äôll have the freedom (and responsibility) to design, build, and ship impactful AI solutions that help security teams defend against evolving threats.

If you want to push the boundaries of AI in cybersecurity, thrive in a collaborative and fast-moving environment, and enjoy the grind of building something that matters, then we‚Äôd love to hear from you!

Take the next step in your AI engineering career and apply today!

‚Ä¢ Exceptional problem-solving and analytical skills with a passion for innovation.

What We Value

üßò Flexible & Remote ‚Äì Work from anywhere with an outcomes-first culture

    "description": "Mirai, a Scopely company based in Riyadh, is building transformative AI solutions focused on enhancing productivity, automation, and data-driven decision-making within the company‚Äôs internal operations and enterprise platforms.

# Next Best Technical Skills/Tools to Learn (Top 5) ‚Äî Based on 22 Job Postings vs. Your Current Skills

You already cover many of the most-requested capabilities (Python, AWS/Azure, Docker, CI/CD, SQL, PyTorch/TensorFlow, LangChain/LangGraph/LlamaIndex, RAG, MLflow, Git, SageMaker/Azure ML). The highest-impact **gaps**‚Äîbased strictly on what appeared in the scanned postings and what‚Äôs **not** listed in your current skill set‚Äîare below.

---

## Top 5 Skills/Tools to Add Next (Highest Market Lift + Not Yet in Your List)

| Rank | Skill / Tool to Learn Next | % of Job Postings Mentioning It (n=22) | Why It‚Äôs a Strong Next Step (Positive Resume Impact) |
|---:|---|---:|---|
| 1 | **Kubernetes** | **27.27%** | Builds on your Docker + CI/CD + cloud strengths and positions you for production-grade LLM/ML deployment and scalable serving. |
| 2 | **FastAPI** | **18.18%** | Complements your Python + GenAI stack by enabling clean, modern model/LLM API services (a common delivery requirement). |
| 3 | **Hugging Face (Transformers ecosystem)** | **13.64%** | Strengthens hands-on LLM development/fine-tuning and model integration beyond orchestration frameworks (pairs well with PyTorch/TensorFlow). |
| 4 | **LangFuse** (LLM observability) | **13.64%** | Adds in-demand LLM tracing/monitoring for agentic/RAG apps‚Äîan increasingly expected production capability beyond basic evaluation. |
| 5 | **Grafana** | **13.64%** | Enhances your MLOps story with production monitoring dashboards (often paired with modern infra stacks in LLM/ML deployment). |

---

## Quick Visual Snapshot (Demand by % of Postings)

| Skill/Tool | Mention Rate |
|---|---:|
| Kubernetes | 27.27% |
| FastAPI | 18.18% |
| Hugging Face | 13.64% |
| LangFuse | 13.64% |
| Grafana | 13.64% |

---

## Notes on What You *Don‚Äôt* Need to Prioritize (Already Covered)
No need to focus on these next since they‚Äôre already in your extracted resume skill set and show strong alignment with the postings: **Python, SQL, Docker, CI/CD, Git, PyTorch, TensorFlow, RAG, LangChain, LangGraph, LlamaIndex, MLflow, AWS, Azure, SageMaker, Azure ML**.

--- 

If you want, I can also suggest a **3‚Äì6 week learning roadmap** and **resume-ready project ideas** that specifically demonstrate Kubernetes + FastAPI + (LangFuse/Grafana) in a production-style GenAI system.
